text: R. Magesh Kumar (second right), Sous Chef, Vivanta by Taj, and S. Deena (right), director, Department of Catering Science and Hotel Management, SNR Sons College, judging the entries at a cookery contest organised as part of the International Women’s Day celebration held at the college in Coimbatore on Wednesday The event was presented by The Hindu in association with VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science.– Photo: M. Periasamy
title: Displaying culinary skills
